subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Imagine if it were Isiah Thomas’s team instead of Larry Bird’s that since November 2004 had led the N.B.A. in behavioral lines crossed, combinations of punches thrown and shots fired from an actual gun.
snippet: Imagine if it were Isiah Thomas’s team instead of Larry Bird’s that since November 2004 had led the N.B.A. in behavioral lines crossed, combinations of punches thrown and shots fired from an actual gun.
